text: "Unwanted" is a song by Avril Lavigne. It was released on her first studio album Let Go. It was released as a radio single. The song is known for its very heavy guitar. It was one of the four songs released on her 2003 EP The Angus Drive EP. == References == Category:Avril Lavigne songs Category:2004 songs
title: Unwanted (Avril Lavigne song)
